entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 5:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
